price: Musa araheza abwira Firawuni ati: “Isango ryo guhurirako, ni ku musi w’ihimbazwa ry’ibirori, igihe abantu bazoba bambaye bakaberwa, bakazokorana mu gitondo izuba riva, bavuye mu mihingo yose”.
arabic: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى

meta.transliteration: qāla mawʿidukum yawmu al-zīnati wa-an yuḥ'shara al-nāsu ḍuḥan
